full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 185 of 262 LC8VMAX6 Rodgers - cross 1 Q. I think you only really need the names if you're flying internationally, right, and you have to clear customs and immigration? 4 A. That is correct. 5 Q. Okay. So even if you weren't told all the names of the passengers, I think you mentioned on your direct exam that you did try to keep track of how many people were on the plane, right? 9 A. Correct. 10 Q. Because, among other things, the pilots need to fill out passenger manifests for each flight, right? 12 A. We're not required to fill out a -- you mean -- by FAA you mean? 14 Q. I don't mean -- I'll rephrase. 15 It was your practice to fill out passenger manifests for each flight; correct? 17 A. That is correct. 18 Q. Okay. And the manifest as you mentioned contains a list of passenger names, among other things, right? 20 A. Yes. 21 Q. Okay. Now, we looked at a lot of entries in what you referred to as your pilot logbook; correct? 23 A. Yes. 24 Q. That was Government's Exhibit 662. We looked at a lot of entries on your logbook; is that right? 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00013463

text_blocks.content: 1 Q. I think you only really need the names if you're flying internationally, right, and you have to clear customs and immigration? 4 A. That is correct. 5 Q. Okay. So even if you weren't told all the names of the passengers, I think you mentioned on your direct exam that you did try to keep track of how many people were on the plane, right? 9 A. Correct. 10 Q. Because, among other things, the pilots need to fill out passenger manifests for each flight, right? 12 A. We're not required to fill out a -- you mean -- by FAA you mean? 14 Q. I don't mean -- I'll rephrase. 15 It was your practice to fill out passenger manifests for each flight; correct? 17 A. That is correct. 18 Q. Okay. And the manifest as you mentioned contains a list of passenger names, among other things, right? 20 A. Yes. 21 Q. Okay. Now, we looked at a lot of entries in what you referred to as your pilot logbook; correct? 23 A. Yes. 24 Q. That was Government's Exhibit 662. We looked at a lot of entries on your logbook; is that right?
